title: SMART Modular Announces Volume Production of Its DDR4 Mini-DIMM
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: SMART Modular Technologies 
NEWARK, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 10/19/15 -- SMART Modular Technologies, Inc., a leading designer, manufacturer and supplier of specialty memory and storage solutions, including memory modules, flash memory cards and other memory and solid state storage products, announces that it has ramped production of its DDR4 Mini-DIMMs making volume quantities available to OEM customers. 
SMART's DDR4 Mini-DIMMs are offered in an 8GB and 16GB VLP Mini-UDIMM form factor and an 8GB and 16GB standard height Mini-RDIMM form factor, all of which fully meet JEDEC's 288-pin form factor and pinout standards. 
Mini-DIMMs are one of the most versatile module form factors available and are quickly becoming a preferred option as an alternative to SO-DIMMs by OEMs who are looking to save board space. Taking up one-third less space than standard SO-DIMMs, supporting up to 16GB densities and providing high data rates up to 2.4GB/s, the Mini-DIMM is ideal for dense networking and telecom system boards. Mini-DIMMs, by design, provide extra power and ground pins which improve signal integrity and reliability further cementing them as a useful alternative to SO-DIMMs. 
OEMs using DDR3 Mini-DIMMs today for networking, telecom, industrial, and storage applications now have a migration path to DDR4. For customers still in the design process, SMART offers a DDR4 Mini-DIMM-to-DIMM test adaptor which allows for Mini-DIMM system testing on standard DDR4 systems that use DIMMs. 
For more information on SMART's DDR4 Mini-DIMMs, please contact SMART's Director of DRAM Product Marketing, Arthur Sainio, via email at Arthur.sainio@smartm.com or visit www.smartm.com . 
About SMART Modular Technologies SMART Modular Technologies is a global leader in specialty memory solutions serving the electronics industry for over 25 years. SMART Modular delivers solutions to a broad customer base, including OEMs that compete in the computing, networking, communications, storage, mobile and industrial markets. Focused on providing extensive customer-specific design capabilities, technical support and value-added testing services, SMART collaborates closely with their global OEM customers throughout their design process and across multiple projects to create memory solutions for demanding applications with differentiated requirements. Taking innovations from the design stage through manufacturing and supply, SMART Modular has developed a comprehensive product line comprised of DRAM and Flash memory technologies across various form factors. SMART Modular is part of the SMART family of global companies. See www.smartm.com for more information.
